name: EncodingUtil

methods.name: base64Decode
methods.description: Converts a Base64-encoded String to a Blob representing its normal form.

methods.name: base64Encode
methods.description: Converts a Blob to an unencoded String representing its normal form.

methods.name: convertFromHex
methods.description: Converts the specified hexadecimal (base 16) string to a Blob value and returns this Blob value.

params.name: inputString
params.description: The hexadecimal string to convert. The string can contain only valid hexadecimal characters (0-9, a-f, A-F) and must have an even number of characters.

methods.name: convertToHex
methods.description: Returns a hexadecimal (base 16) representation of the inputBlob. This method can be used to compute the client response (for example, HA1 or HA2) for HTTP Digest Authentication (RFC2617).

methods.name: urlDecode
methods.signature: public static String urlDecode(String inputString, String encodingScheme)
methods.description: Decodes a string in application/x-www-form-urlencoded format using a specific encoding scheme, for example “UTF-8.”

methods.name: urlEncode
methods.signature: public static String urlEncode(String inputString, String encodingScheme)
methods.description: Encodes a string into the application/x-www-form-urlencoded format using a specific encoding scheme, for example “UTF-8.”

description: Use the methods in the EncodingUtil class to encode and decode URL strings, and convert strings to hexadecimal format.
